18
19#ifndef _PROGNAME_H
20#define _PROGNAME_H
21
22/* Programs using this file should do the following in main():
23 set_program_name (argv[0]);
24 */
25
26
27#ifdef __cplusplus
28extern "C" {
29#endif
30
31
32/* String containing name the program is called with. */
33extern DLL_VARIABLE const char *program_name;
34
35/* Set program_name, based on argv[0]. */
36extern void set_program_name (const char *argv0);
37
38#if ENABLE_RELOCATABLE
39
40/* Set program_name, based on argv[0], and original installation prefix and
41 directory, for relocatability. */
42extern void set_program_name_and_installdir (const char *argv0,
43 const char *orig_installprefix,
44 const char *orig_installdir);
45#undef set_program_name
46#define set_program_name(ARG0) \
47 set_program_name_and_installdir (ARG0, INSTALLPREFIX, INSTALLDIR)
48
49/* Return the full pathname of the current executable, based on the earlier
50 call to set_program_name_and_installdir. Return NULL if unknown. */
51extern char *get_full_program_name (void);
52
53#endif
54
55
56#ifdef __cplusplus
57}
58#endif
59
60
61#endif /* _PROGNAME_H */
62
